long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
StorySpace is the ultimate browser extension for anonymous viewing, downloading, and managing Stories on Instagram and Facebook. 

ğŸš€ Explore, save, and interact with stories securely, all while staying completely invisible.

	âœ¨ Key Features for Instagram:
ğŸ‘€ Anonymous Instagram Story Viewing â€“ Watch any IG story without leaving a trace. Users will never know you viewed their content.
â¬‡ï¸ Download Instagram Stories â€“ Save photos, videos, and highlights from Instagram to your device with just one click.
ğŸ¥ Record & Download Instagram Live Streams â€“ Capture IG live broadcasts and watch them offline anytime.
ğŸ” Search Public Stories â€“ Quickly find stories across open Instagram profiles.
ğŸš« View IG Stories from Unfollowed Users â€“ Access and download stories even from users you don't follow.
ğŸ“¤ Upload Your Stories â€“ Easily upload your content to Instagram directly through the extension.

	ğŸ“˜ Key Features for Facebook:

ğŸ•¶ï¸ View Stories Anonymously â€“ Stay invisible while viewing Facebook stories. Your name won't appear in the viewer list.
â¬‡ï¸ Download FB Stories â€“ Save Facebook stories (photos and videos) directly to your device in high quality.
ğŸŒ Search Stories by Profiles, Places, and Pages â€“ Find Facebook stories based on public profiles, locations, or pages effortlessly.
ğŸ”— Access Any User's Stories â€“ View and download Facebook stories from anyone, even if you're not friends with them.

	ğŸŒŸ Additional Benefits:

ğŸŒ— Light & Dark Themes on FAcebook and Instagram â€“ Switch between light and dark modes for a comfortable viewing experience anytime.
ğŸ”’ Full Privacy & Anonymity â€“ All your actions are secure, private, and leave no trace.
ğŸ–±ï¸ Dedicated Workspace â€“ Simply click the extension icon to access the StorySpace page, where you can manage all your activity in one convenient place.

	ğŸš€ How It Works:

1. Install StorySpace â€“ Add the extension to your browser.
2. Open the StorySpace Workspace â€“ Click the extension icon to launch the dedicated page.
3. Explore Stories â€“ Search, view, download, and manage stories anonymously with ease.

StorySpace is your all-in-one solution for interacting with Instagram and Facebook stories on your terms. Whether you want to watch stories without being seen, save content for later, or discover new stories effortlessly â€“ StorySpace makes it simple, secure, and anonymous.

Take control of stories today with StorySpace! ğŸš€
